projects.description: This project's goal is to develop a scalable iOS/Android application using Dart, Flutter, and Google's Firstore, in the aims of tracking weight-lifting progress.

projects.description: An attempt at opening Apple Music playlists, parsing the JSON, taking all the song information, and creating Spotify playlists using the Spotipy API.
